meta.name: Have I Got News for You
meta.description: Based on the week's news, Have I Got News for You is fronted by guest hosts and features two regular team captains, Paul Merton and Ian Hislop. Each week the show invites two guests to cast a jaundiced eye over the week's news, resulting in a fast flow of anarchic, spontaneous and hugely entertaining wit and humour. Guests typically represent the world of politics, comedy, show-business and journalism, and are often themselves particularly newsworthy participants. The final touches of Have I Got News for You are put together only hours before recording, allowing guests to comment on the late-breaking news stories of the day.

videos.title: Martin Clunes, Phil Wang, TBA
videos.overview: Martin Clunes is host, with guest panellists including comedian Phil Wang joining team captains Paul Merton and Ian Hislop as they delve into the news.

videos.title: Have I Got 2025 for You
videos.overview: Team captains Paul Merton and Ian Hislop are joined by a variety of guest hosts and panellists from the worlds of comedy, journalism and current affairs for a compilation that looks back at the big news of 2025.

videos.title: Sandi Toksvig, Kate Saunders
videos.overview: A new comedy quiz show hosted by Angus Deayton. Team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton, abetted by guests from the world of journalism and humour, poke a sharp finger into the soft underbelly of this week's news.

videos.title: Jan Ravens, Martin Young
videos.overview: A comedy quiz show hosted by Angus Deayton. Team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton, abetted by guests from the world of journalism and humour, poke a sharp finger into the soft underbelly of the week's news.

videos.title: Tony Slattery, Robert Harris
videos.overview: A comedy quiz show hosted by Angus Deayton. Team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton, abetted by this week's guests comedian Tony Slattery and journalist Robert Harris, poke a sharp finger into the week's news.

videos.title: Arthur Smith, Gill Pyrah
videos.overview: A comedy quiz show hosted by Angus Deayton. Team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton, abetted by guests from the world of journalism and humour, are challenged on the week's news. This week's guests include comedian Arthur Smith.

videos.title: Dillie Keane, Simon Hoggart
videos.overview: A comedy quiz show hosted by Angus Deayton. Team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton, abetted by guests from the world of journalism and humour, poke a sharp finger into this week's news.

videos.title: Rory McGrath, Ken Livingstone
videos.overview: A comedy quiz show hosted by Angus Deayton. Team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton, abetted by this week's guests comedian Rory McGrath and Ken Livingstone MP, are challenged on the week's news.

videos.title: Clive Anderson, Russell Davies
videos.overview: A comedy quiz show hosted by Angus Deayton. Team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton, abetted by this week's guests chat show host Clive Anderson and journalist Russell Davies, are challenged on the week's news.

videos.title: Germaine Greer, Tony Banks
videos.overview: A comedy quiz show hosted by Angus Deayton. Team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton, abetted by this week's guests Tony Banks MP and writer Germaine Greer, are challenged on the week's news.
